full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
WS4577202029

## Solicitation Name (English)
Five-Dash-Oh-One-One - File Folders

## Solicitation Name (French)
Cinq-Barre-Zéro-Zéro-Un-Un - Chemises de classement

## Brief Synopsis
Library and Archives Canada is seeking to procure number and unnumbered pocket file folders for fiscal years 2024-2025 and 2025-2026.

## Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

* **Solicitation Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Tender Details

* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: June 6, 2024
* **Publication Date**: May 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 19, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 17, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

## Procurement Category

* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **UNSPC**: 44122000
* **UNSPC Description (English)**: Folders, binders, and indexes
* **UNSPC Description (French)**: Chemises, dossiers et classeurs

## Trade Agreements

* **Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity

* **Name (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Name (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Cao, Luke (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19800497?extsite=MTk4MDA0OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachment**: None
